pm-surya-ghar-residential-ongrid-subsidy.system_inclusions:
• MNRE approved ALMM solar modules
• Grid-tied inverter with remote monitoring
• Hot dip galvanized mounting structure
• AC/DC protection, earthing and lightning protection
• Installation, testing and commissioning
• Net metering support documentation
pm-surya-ghar-residential-ongrid-subsidy.payment_terms:
1) 70% advance along with work order confirmation.
2) 20% before dispatch of material at site.
3) 10% after successful commissioning and handover.
pm-surya-ghar-residential-ongrid-subsidy.warranty:
• Solar module: As per manufacturer warranty card
• Inverter: As per manufacturer warranty card
• Structure: 5 years against manufacturing defects
• Workmanship/service support: 1 year
pm-surya-ghar-residential-ongrid-subsidy.system_type_explainer: On-grid systems operate with utility grid synchronisation and can export surplus units through net-metering approvals as per DISCOM norms.
pm-surya-ghar-residential-ongrid-subsidy.transportation: Transportation within standard service radius is included. Unloading support and local permissions to be coordinated by customer where required.
pm-surya-ghar-residential-ongrid-subsidy.terms_conditions: All applicable statutory approvals and subsidy timelines are subject to prevailing state/central guidelines. Any civil work beyond standard scope is chargeable extra.
pm-surya-ghar-residential-ongrid-subsidy.pm_subsidy_info: PM Surya Ghar subsidy is subject to beneficiary eligibility, portal approvals and DISCOM processes. Subsidy amount is credited directly to customer account by the government as per current policy.
